title: Tomato Juice Is the Taste of My Younger Brother - Novel Updates
tags: Incest   Obsessive Love   R-18   Short Story   Yandere
author: U
description:
He always took care of me in one way or another since we were little. That big brother of mine, got a job and returned home. From today on, we can live together again. 

The younger brother only wanted to be helpful to his older brother. If it’s something within his ability then, he’d do anything his older brother asked him to…. But on the other hand, his older brother’s words were nothing but a surprise. 

The hellish day has just started.>
